loans.name: Mortgage loan
loans.description: A loan used to purchase or refinance a home, where the property serves as collateral.

loans.name: Auto loan
loans.description: A loan specifically for purchasing a vehicle, often secured by the vehicle itself.

loans.name: Personal loan
loans.description: An unsecured loan that can be used for various personal expenses, typically without collateral.

loans.name: Credit card
loans.description: A revolving line of credit that allows users to borrow up to a certain limit for purchases and cash advances.
